name: SupportMoulderAndGilliam
_source: speak;Gilliam;No, Moulder.|I didn't hear a thing.
speak;Moulder;Was it just in my head?|Hm.|That can't be good.
speak;Gilliam;Moulder, you've been working yourself too hard.|You should rest.
speak;Moulder;No, I'm not tired in the slightest.|I'm fine.|I cannot believe you don't hear it!|Is something wrong with your ears?
speak;Gilliam;Moulder, please.|I know I've seen many battles, but I'm younger than you are.|My hearing is fine.
speak;Moulder;Then why can't you hear it?|I'm starting to worry about that noise.
speak;Gilliam;Your ears are playing tricks on you.
speak;Moulder;There it was again!|That sound I told you about.|Gilliam, did you hear it?
speak;Gilliam;Oh, not again.|No, Moulder.|I don't hear anything.
speak;Moulder;Is it really just me?|Am I the only one who can hear it?
speak;Gilliam;Maybe you should describe the sound to me.|Is it a dull noise?|A chirp?|If it's louder, I should be able to hear it.
speak;Moulder;No, it's nothing like that.|It's soft...a melody of some sort.
speak;Gilliam;A melody?|Are you saying someone is playing music during a battle?|What kind of music?|What sort of instrument is it?
speak;Gilliam;Heavenly?|You don't suppose it's some sort of...sign, do you?
speak;Moulder;Gilliam, I would be happy if you didn't say such things.
speak;Gilliam;Oh, sorry.|But, Moulder...|You're the one dedicated to spiritual matters.|I wouldn't be surprised if-
speak;Moulder;I said enough of that, Gilliam.|I must be imagining things.|That's all.
speak;Gilliam;A melody only you can hear.|Sounds mysterious to me.
speak;Moulder;I agree.|Especially because I can't explain the cause.|I must say, I'm worried.|Gilliam...|If something were to...|happen, well...|I'm counting on you.
speak;Gilliam;Moulder, we've been friends for a decade and a half.|I'll protect you.|Besides...|it's my duty as a Knight of Frelia.
speak;Moulder;I know I can count on you, Gilliam.|I know that better than any man.|You have my gratitude.
speak;Gilliam;How are your ears today, Moulder?|Can you still hear that melody?
speak;Moulder;No, I haven't heard it for a while.|I guess it was a hallucination after all.
speak;Gilliam;Regardless of the cause, I'm glad that you don't hear it anymore.
speak;Moulder;I'm relieved, too, but...|I also miss it somewhat.|The melody was haunting me, and I finally remember what it was.
speak;Moulder;That was the music played at King Hayden's coronation.
speak;Gilliam;Frelia's coronation hymn.|Ah, I remember it well...|It is a strong song, and Frelia's knightly choir performed it well.
speak;Moulder;I was the one who carried the crown to the throne.|I was so nervous that I might drop it!

speak;Gilliam;I remember that you were the one to bear that regal burden.|I was a mere recruit, stuck in the back with the other whelps.|You know, I remember now...|Your hands shook like you were frozen!
speak;Moulder;Yes, and then someone shouted, in a loud voice, "Get ahold of yourself, man!"|The crown slipped, and I fumbled to catch it!|I was so embarrassed.
speak;Gilliam;I'm so sorry.|I was young.|You know, I felt so bad that I have spent years making it up to you.|I acted before I thought.|I'm sorry for all the embarrassment I caused.
speak;Moulder;That's right!|I believe I met you the very next day.|Aha!|I've figured it out!
speak;Moulder;That melody-I could only hear it when I was with you.|That means...
speak;Moulder;It was a sign.|A sign from above that we must both return to the basics.
speak;Gilliam;Return to the basics?|What does- Ah. Of course.
speak;Moulder;Yes.|We must remember who we were and what drove us to join this cause.
